data.quote: People often say that motivation doesn't last. Well, neither does bathing -- that's why we recommend it daily.
data.author: Zig Ziglar

data.quote: Someday is not a day of the week.
data.author: Denise Brennan-Nelson

data.quote: If you cannot do great things, do small things in a great way.
data.author: Napoleon Hill

data.quote: The best leaders are those most interested in surrounding themselves with assistants and associates smarter than they are. They are frank in admitting this and are willing to pay for such talents.
data.author: Antos Parrish

data.quote: Nothing is really work unless you would rather be doing something else.
data.author: J.M. Barrie

data.quote: Without hustle, talent will only carry you so far.
data.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

data.quote: I'd rather regret the things I've done than regret the things I haven't done.
data.author: Lucille Ball
